description: The intent of this solicitation is to establish one (1) Contract for one (1) initial period, with the option to extend the term of the Contract by up to three (3) one-year irrevocable option periods under the same conditions.
full_summary:
**Status of a Request for Proposal (RFP) Notice for Senior Project Administrator**

**Reference Number:** W8486-249376/A
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-249376/A
**Publication Date:** November 3, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 20, 2023, 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
**Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified
**Current Status:** Expired

**Overview of the RFP:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the services of a Senior Project Administrator under Stream 3, Project Management Services. This RFP seeks to establish one (1) contract for an initial period, with the option to extend for up to three (3) years. This solicitation is open only to pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS.

**Work Location:**

The work will be carried out in the National Capital Region, with a specific location at 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, Ontario.

**Security Requirements:**

A security clearance of Secret is required. Suppliers must comply with the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC).

**Procurement Method:**

This is a competitive process, with the successful supplier being selected based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers:**

Please refer to the attached list of pre-qualified suppliers.

**Contact Information:**

Inquiries regarding this RFP should be directed to:

* Name: Kayla Shabsove
* Email: [kayla.shabsove@forces.gc.ca](mailto:kayla.shabsove@forces.gc.ca)

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Key Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: November 20, 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

Note: The text has been rewritten to be concise, easy to read, and free of grammatical errors. It maintains the essential information required for a tender notice, including the reference number, solicitation number, publication date, tender closing date, expected contract dates, and current status. Additionally, it includes a clear overview of the RFP, work location,
